### Start year


### Timesteps
```{r ntimesteps}

```

### Cores to use
```{r ncores}

```

### LANDIS scenarios

### Save computing controls
```{r save computing controls}
save(proj_path,
     year0,
     ntimesteps,
     ncores,
     scn_list,
     rep_list,
     file = "output/RData/00_comp_controls.RData")
```
